name: Recipe For Love (mattybm, Evilginger606, geologay)
description:
So you think you’re going to hell. You know, maybe it won’t be so bad. Maybe there’ll be hot women. After flirting your way out of eternal damnation, play as cute girl Melissa and collect all the ingredients to make breakfast in bed for your demon wife!

Recipe for Love is our first game developed as part of a 30 day game jam! It's a short but finished game meant to be played in a 30 minute to 1 hour session. 

Recommended for ages 16+. Strong language and vaguely suggestive content.

CONTROLS

Press spacebar to advance the story and select items

Press H to hide the dialog box

Press X to read earlier dialogue

Controller support should work using the D-pad, A, and B buttons!
